Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

24 #include <sstream>
25 using std::stringstream;
26 
27 using namespace Kassiopeia;
28 using namespace katrin;
29 
30 int main( int anArgc, char** anArgv )
31 {
32  // read in xml file
33  KXMLTokenizer tXMLTokenizer;
34  KVariableProcessor tVariableProcessor;
35  KFormulaProcessor tFormulaProcessor;
36  KIncludeProcessor tIncludeProcessor;
37  KLoopProcessor tLoopProcessor;
38  KConditionProcessor tConditionProcessor;
39  KTagProcessor tTagProcessor;
40  KElementProcessor tElementProcessor;
41 
42  tVariableProcessor.InsertAfter( &tXMLTokenizer );
43  tFormulaProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
44  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tFormulaProcessor );
45  tLoopProcessor.InsertAfter( &tIncludeProcessor );
46  tConditionProcessor.InsertAfter( &tLoopProcessor );
47  tTagProcessor.InsertAfter( &tConditionProcessor );
48  tElementProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTagProcessor );
49 
50  KTextFile tInputFile;
51  tInputFile.AddToBases( "TestGenerator.xml" );
52  tInputFile.AddToPaths( string( CONFIG_DEFAULT_DIR ) + string( "/Validation" ) );
53  tXMLTokenizer.ProcessFile( &tInputFile );
54 
55  // read in command line parameters
56  if( anArgc <= 1 )
57  {
58  mainmsg( eWarning ) << ret;
59  mainmsg << "usage:" << ret;
60  mainmsg << "TestGenerator <count=UNSIGNED INT> <command=PARENT.FIELD:CHILD>" << ret;
61  mainmsg << ret;
62  mainmsg << "available generator components found in " << CONFIG_DEFAULT_DIR << "/Validation/TestGenerator.xml" << ret;
63  mainmsg << "link objects there to the root generator using the command interface above to test them" << ret;
64  mainmsg << eom;
65  return -1;
66  }
67 
68  unsigned int tCount;
69  KSObject* tParent;
70  KSObject* tChild;
71  KSCommand* tCommand;
72  vector< KSCommand* > tCommands;
73  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
74  vector< KSCommand* >::reverse_iterator tCommandRIt;
75  size_t tEqualsPos;
76  size_t tPeriodPos;
77  size_t tColonPos;
78  string tArgument;
79  string tArgumentLabel;
80  string tArgumentValue;
81  string tCommandParent;
82  string tCommandField;
83  string tCommandChild;
84  stringstream tArgumentConverter;
85  for( int tArgumentIndex = 1; tArgumentIndex < anArgc; tArgumentIndex++ )
86  {
87  tArgument.assign( anArgv[ tArgumentIndex ] );
88 
89  tEqualsPos = tArgument.find( '=' );
90  if( tEqualsPos == string::npos )
91  {
92  mainmsg( eWarning ) << ret;
93  mainmsg << "malformed argument <" << tArgument << ">" << ret;
94  mainmsg << "arguments must be of form <NAME=VALUE>" << ret;
95  mainmsg << eom;
96  return -1;
97  }
98 
99  tArgumentLabel = tArgument.substr( 0, tEqualsPos );
100  tArgumentValue = tArgument.substr( tEqualsPos + 1 );
101 
102  if( tArgumentLabel == "count" )
103  {
104  tArgumentConverter.clear();
105  tArgumentConverter.str( tArgumentValue );
106  tArgumentConverter >> tCount;
107  continue;
108  }
109 
110  if( tArgumentLabel == "command" )
111  {
112  tPeriodPos = tArgumentValue.find( '.' );
113  tColonPos = tArgumentValue.find( ':' );
114 
115  if( (tPeriodPos == string::npos) || (tColonPos == string::npos) || (tColonPos < tPeriodPos) )
116  {
117  mainmsg( eWarning ) << ret;
118  mainmsg << "malformed argument <" << tArgument << ">" << ret;
119  mainmsg << "command arguments must be of form <command=PARENT.FIELD:CHILD>" << ret;
120  mainmsg << eom;
121  return -1;
122  }
123 
124  tCommandParent = tArgumentValue.substr( 0, tPeriodPos );
125  tCommandField = tArgumentValue.substr( tPeriodPos + 1, tColonPos - tPeriodPos - 1 );
126  tCommandChild = tArgumentValue.substr( tColonPos + 1 );
127 
128  tParent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get( tCommandParent );
129  tChild = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get( tCommandChild );
130  tCommand = tParent->CreateCommand( tCommandField );
131  tCommand->BindParent( tParent );
132  tCommand->BindChild( tChild );
133  tCommands.push_back( tCommand );
134  }
135  }
136 
137  // initialize kassiopeia
138  KSRootGenerator* tRootGenerator = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootGenerator >( "root_generator" );
139 
140  tRootGenerator->Initialize();
141  for( tCommandIt = tCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != tCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
142  {
143  tCommand = *tCommandIt;
144  tCommand->Initialize();
145  }
146 
147  tRootGenerator->Activate();
148  for( tCommandIt = tCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != tCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
149  {
150  tCommand = *tCommandIt;
151  tCommand->Activate();
152  }
153 
154  // initialize root
155  TApplication tApplication( "Test Generator", 0, NULL );
156 
157  TCanvas tGeneratorEnergyCanvas( "generator_energy_canvas", "Generator Energy" );
158  TH1D tGeneratorEnergyHistogram( "generator_energy_histogram", "generator_energy_histogram", 600, 700., 1300. );
159 
160  TCanvas tGeneratorMinTimeCanvas( "generator_min_time_canvas", "Generator MinTime" );
161  TH1D tGeneratorMinTimeHistogram( "generator_min_time_histogram", "generator_min_time_histogram", 100, 0., 1. );
162 
163  TCanvas tGeneratorMaxTimeCanvas( "generator_max_time_canvas", "Generator MaxTime" );
164  TH1D tGeneratorMaxTimeHistogram( "generator_max_time_histogram", "generator_max_time_histogram", 100, 0., 1. );
165 
166  TCanvas tGeneratorLocationCanvas( "generator_location_canvas", "Generator Location" );
167  TH3D tGeneratorLocationHistogram( "generator_location_histogram", "generator_location_histogram", 100, -1.1, 1.1, 100, -1.1, 1.1, 100, -1.1, 1.1 );
168 
169  TCanvas tGeneratorRadiusCanvas( "generator_radius_canvas", "Generator Radius" );
170  TH1D tGeneratorRadiusHistogram( "generator_radius_histogram", "generator_radius_histogram", 100, 0., 1. );
171 
172  TCanvas tParticlePositionCanvas( "particle_position_canvas", "Particle Position" );
173  TH3D tParticlePositionHistogram( "particle_position_histogram", "particle_position_histogram", 100, -1.1, 1.1, 100, -1.1, 1.1, 100, -1.1, 1.1 );
174 
175  TCanvas tParticleDirectionCanvas( "particle_direction_canvas", "Particle Direction" );
176  TH3D tParticleDirectionHistogram( "particle_direction_histogram", "particle_direction_histogram", 100, -1.1, 1.1, 100, -1.1, 1.1, 100, -1.1, 1.1 );
177 
178  TCanvas tParticleDirectionThetaCanvas( "particle_direction_theta_canvas", "Particle Direction Polar Angle" );
179  TH1D tParticleDirectionThetaHistogram( "particle_direction_theta_histogram", "particle_direction_theta_histogram", 90, 0., 180. );
180 
181  TCanvas tParticleDirectionPhiCanvas( "particle_direction_phi_canvas", "Particle Direction Azimuthal Angle" );
182  TH1D tParticleDirectionPhiHistogram( "particle_direction_phi_histogram", "particle_direction_phi_histogram", 180, 0., 360. );
183 
184  TCanvas tParticleEnergyCanvas( "particle_energy_canvas", "Particle Energy" );
185  TH1D tParticleEnergyHistogram( "particle_energy_histogram", "particle_energy_histogram", 600, 700., 1300. );
186 
187  TCanvas tParticleTimeCanvas( "particle_time_canvas", "Particle Time" );
188  TH1D tParticleTimeHistogram( "particle_time_histogram", "particle_time_histogram", 100, 0., 1. );
189 
190  // generate events
191  KSEvent tEvent;
192  KSParticle* tParticle;
193  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
194 
195  tRootGenerator->SetEvent( &tEvent );
196 
197  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tCount; tIndex++ )
198  {
199  tRootGenerator->ExecuteGeneration();
200 
201  tGeneratorEnergyHistogram.Fill( tEvent.GeneratorEnergy() );
202  tGeneratorMinTimeHistogram.Fill( tEvent.GeneratorMinTime() );
203  tGeneratorMaxTimeHistogram.Fill( tEvent.GeneratorMaxTime() );
204  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.Fill( tEvent.GeneratorLocation().X(), tEvent.GeneratorLocation().Y(), tEvent.GeneratorLocation().Z() );
205  tGeneratorRadiusHistogram.Fill( tEvent.GeneratorRadius() );
206 
207  for( tParticleIt = tEvent.ParticleQueue().begin(); tParticleIt != tEvent.ParticleQueue().end(); tParticleIt++ )
208  {
209  tParticle = (*tParticleIt);
210 
211  tParticlePositionHistogram.Fill( tParticle->GetPosition().X(), tParticle->GetPosition().Y(), tParticle->GetPosition().Z() );
212  tParticleDirectionHistogram.Fill( tParticle->GetMomentum().Unit().X(), tParticle->GetMomentum().Unit().Y(), tParticle->GetMomentum().Unit().Z() );
213  tParticleDirectionThetaHistogram.Fill( (180. / KConst::Pi()) * tParticle->GetMomentum().PolarAngle() );
214  tParticleDirectionPhiHistogram.Fill( (180. / KConst::Pi()) * tParticle->GetMomentum().AzimuthalAngle() );
215  tParticleEnergyHistogram.Fill( tParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() );
216  tParticleTimeHistogram.Fill( tParticle->GetTime() );
217 
218  delete tParticle;
219  }
220  tEvent.ParticleQueue().clear();
221 
222  }
223 
224  // show plots
225  tGeneratorEnergyCanvas.cd( 0 );
226  tGeneratorEnergyHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
227  tGeneratorEnergyHistogram.SetTitle( "Generator Energy" );
228  tGeneratorEnergyHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Energy [eV]" );
229  tGeneratorEnergyHistogram.Write();
230  tGeneratorEnergyHistogram.Draw( "" );
231 
232  tGeneratorMinTimeCanvas.cd( 0 );
233  tGeneratorMinTimeHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
234  tGeneratorMinTimeHistogram.SetTitle( "Generator Minimum Time" );
235  tGeneratorMinTimeHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Minimum Time [sec]" );
236  tGeneratorMinTimeHistogram.Write();
237  tGeneratorMinTimeHistogram.Draw( "" );
238 
239  tGeneratorMaxTimeCanvas.cd( 0 );
240  tGeneratorMaxTimeHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
241  tGeneratorMaxTimeHistogram.SetTitle( "Generator Maximum Time" );
242  tGeneratorMaxTimeHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Maximum Time [sec]" );
243  tGeneratorMaxTimeHistogram.Write();
244  tGeneratorMaxTimeHistogram.Draw( "" );
245 
246  tGeneratorLocationCanvas.cd( 0 );
247  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
248  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
249  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
250  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.SetTitle( "Generator Location" );
251  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "X [m]" );
252  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Y [m]" );
253  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.GetZaxis()->SetTitle( "Z [m]" );
254  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.Write();
255  tGeneratorLocationHistogram.Draw( "P" );
256 
257  tGeneratorRadiusCanvas.cd( 0 );
258  tGeneratorRadiusHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
259  tGeneratorRadiusHistogram.SetTitle( "Generator Radius" );
260  tGeneratorRadiusHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Radius [m]" );
261  tGeneratorRadiusHistogram.Write();
262  tGeneratorRadiusHistogram.Draw( "" );
263 
264  tParticlePositionCanvas.cd( 0 );
265  tParticlePositionHistogram.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
266  tParticlePositionHistogram.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
267  tParticlePositionHistogram.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
268  tParticlePositionHistogram.SetTitle( "Particle Position" );
269  tParticlePositionHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "X [m]" );
270  tParticlePositionHistogram.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Y [m]" );
271  tParticlePositionHistogram.GetZaxis()->SetTitle( "Z [m]" );
272  tParticlePositionHistogram.Write();
273  tParticlePositionHistogram.Draw( "P" );
274 
275  tParticleDirectionCanvas.cd( 0 );
276  tParticleDirectionHistogram.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
277  tParticleDirectionHistogram.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
278  tParticleDirectionHistogram.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
279  tParticleDirectionHistogram.SetTitle( "Particle Direction" );
280  tParticleDirectionHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "X [none]" );
281  tParticleDirectionHistogram.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Y [none]" );
282  tParticleDirectionHistogram.GetZaxis()->SetTitle( "Z [none]" );
283  tParticleDirectionHistogram.Write();
284  tParticleDirectionHistogram.Draw( "P" );
285 
286  tParticleDirectionThetaCanvas.cd( 0 );
287  tParticleDirectionThetaHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
288  tParticleDirectionThetaHistogram.SetTitle( "Particle Polar Angle" );
289  tParticleDirectionThetaHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Theta [degrees]" );
290  tParticleDirectionThetaHistogram.Write();
291  tParticleDirectionThetaHistogram.Draw( "" );
292 
293  tParticleDirectionPhiCanvas.cd( 0 );
294  tParticleDirectionPhiHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
295  tParticleDirectionPhiHistogram.SetTitle( "Particle Azimuthal Angle" );
296  tParticleDirectionPhiHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Phi [degrees]" );
297  tParticleDirectionPhiHistogram.Write();
298  tParticleDirectionPhiHistogram.Draw( "" );
299 
300  tParticleEnergyCanvas.cd( 0 );
301  tParticleEnergyHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
302  tParticleEnergyHistogram.SetTitle( "Particle Energy" );
303  tParticleEnergyHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Energy [eV]" );
304  tParticleEnergyHistogram.Write();
305  tParticleEnergyHistogram.Draw( "" );
306 
307  tParticleTimeCanvas.cd( 0 );
308  tParticleTimeHistogram.SetFillColor( kBlue );
309  tParticleTimeHistogram.SetTitle( "Particle Time" );
310  tParticleTimeHistogram.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Time [sec]" );
311  tParticleTimeHistogram.Write();
312  tParticleTimeHistogram.Draw( "" );
313 
314  tApplication.Run();
315 
316  // deinitialize kassiopeia
317  for( tCommandRIt = tCommands.rbegin(); tCommandRIt != tCommands.rend(); tCommandRIt++ )
318  {
319  tCommand = *tCommandRIt;
320  tCommand->Deactivate();
321  }
322  tRootGenerator->Deactivate();
323 
324  for( tCommandRIt = tCommands.rbegin(); tCommandRIt != tCommands.rend(); tCommandRIt++ )
325  {
326  tCommand = *tCommandRIt;
327  tCommand->Deinitialize();
328  }
329  tRootGenerator->Deinitialize();
330 
331  for( tCommandRIt = tCommands.rbegin(); tCommandRIt != tCommands.rend(); tCommandRIt++ )
332  {
333  tCommand = *tCommandRIt;
334  delete tCommand;
335  }
336 
337 
338  return 0;
339 }
